review: I'm getting ready to send it back for a refund. I can't get the remote to work unless I take the batteries out and reinstall. That's ridiculous! Roku has been lax in responding. Too bad their customer service and technical issues has to present a bad experience to first-time users.Been trying to contact customer service with no luck or response. BEWARE!! It could be a good product but if the remote doesn't work and you can't get customer support you are out-of-luck.

review: i purchased a roku from amazon 2 years ago , called them up , paid for their service which they said was a one time deal , everything was fine . i changed cable tv companies and my rokus wouldnt work , called roku service got a mexican girl who spoke very poor english and talked 100 miles per hour , and i could under stand 1 in every 4 words she was saying , then she starts with a 2 minute advertisment about what roku has to offer , she would not listen to a darn word i was saying . i get frustrated and hang up and call again , get the same nonsence , and finally got told i need to talk to a service tech and get me straitened out but its $39.99 to talk to him and $59.99 to get my service reinstated , i told her i already paid for your service and have a account and im not paying again , SHE HUNG UP ON ME . after several more attempts i finally gave up . my advice is buy a fire stick or a apple do not buy roku you will be just flushing your money away.
author: John Badillo

review: Works really well. I was worried by two reports on this product. 1) it takes ages to boot up and only boots up with the TV on. -This is true it is only powered on when the TV is on (If you are using TV USB) but the boot time is not bad. 2) It is slow and laggy. - I have the Roku 3 and using PLEX (RARFLIX) it is just as responsive and works sweet. Note, I am running this in 720p only though.For the price, this is a 5 star device.
